content: I’ve got a game design I’ve been toying with using a metaphor of pushing shopping carts around — only to have people mess them up again. Oddly, my game is called Sisyphus, and it’s about coming to terms with your life and how absurd everything is. Funny: I never actually read any Camus, but the stuff I see quoted of him resonates with me at a profound level. I’ll have to pick up this book.
